results.name: Megalovania: Just Shapes and Beats Edition

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD AMD Phenom II X6 1055T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 / AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 ( 2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050TI (4 ГБ) / Radeon RX 570 (4 ГБ)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
